description: An interactive illustration that went viral several years ago is being expanded for a PC release.

description: Barone paused work on his new game so he could focus on Stardew Valley's 1.6 update, but he wants everyone to know he hasn't abandoned it.

description: The Humble Sci-Fi Shooter Bundle is such a good deal, I'm willing to admit that I missed it for more than a week just so I can tell you about it now.
title: Get Doom, Prey, System Shock, Dark Forces, and all the Crysis games for less than $20 in this really good Humble Bundle

description: This year's showcase featured over 80 games to look forward to in the new year.

description: Civilization 7 aims to keep you invested until the end, even if it means changing sides mid-campaign.

description: "We're really expanding on the parts that were appreciated in World and taking it even further."

description: For those who take a little marshaled artillery in their martial arts.

description: The more I think about this one, the more meta it sounds.

description: Why bother meditating on the cosmos when you have a shiny, neon mace?

description: I swore I'd never go back to retail.
